thread.title: Listen: VIXX’s Ravi Shows Off His Talents In Pre-Listening For 1st Mini Album “R.EAL1ZE”
thread.title_full: Listen: VIXX’s Ravi Shows Off His Talents In Pre-Listening For 1st Mini Album “R.EAL1ZE”

author: kminjungee
title: Listen: VIXX’s Ravi Shows Off His Talents In Pre-Listening For 1st Mini Album “R.EAL1ZE”
text:
Shares 897   
With only days left until his first solo album drops, VIXX’s Ravi revealed a little sneak peak of this exciting release! 
Released on January 3 at midnight KST, the pre-listening for “R.EAL1ZE” is the first look at all the songs included in its impressive tracklist , featuring artists like San E, CNBLUE’s Jung Yong Hwa, and fellow VIXX member Ken. 
Notably, the idol had a significant hand in the composition, arrangement, and lyric-making of every single track included in his first mini album. 
Take a listen below and let us know which one is your favorite song so far!
